author: JAKE COYLE  AP Film Writer
title: Oscars slim down, will hand out 8 awards ahead of broadcast
content:
NEW YORK -- To combat slumping ratings, the Oscars are undergoing a radical slimming down, with eight awards to be presented off-air during next month's telecast of the 94th Academy Awards.
